job_title: Personal Care/Nursing Repectionist in West York, PA
cons: The pay was too low and only able to get a .25 an hour wage increase per year.

review_title: Proper costumer service, poor staff satisfaction
pros: Residents are family orientated and enjoyable to be around, yet if the residents do not like you, upper management will not back the staff up and defend.
cons: Lack of communication from upper management.  Staff with 5 or more years of work get little to no respect from upper management.  Younger staff are heard more.  I even seen an incident where a new staff member set up an older staff member to get fired.  Upper management went ahead and believed the new staff member and fired the staff member who was there for over 10 years.  That new staff member proceeded to take over a man agent position.

pros: Work with the elderly to help them remain independent in the community as long as possible
cons: Many layers of government reporting, from fed, state and localr  very paper centric with

pros: Mission is to serve seniors with limited or no resources, their family caregivers.
cons: Mission gets lost in struggle to provide services cost-effectively and in compliance with regulations.

pros: I liked working with the elderly at the nursing home, and I enjoyed the job.
cons: Poorly run, very unorganized and under staffed all of the time.
